title: Matt Bai & Jason Reitman: "We're at a point where politics are entertainment"
description: Matt Bai, author of "All the Truth Is Out: The Week Politics Went Tabloid" & Jason Reitman, director of "The Front Runner" sit down with Chuck to discuss the story of Gary Hart's embattled 1988 presidential campaign.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
